metadata.description: Due to an incomplete fix to  CVE-2022-31629 https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c43m-486j-j32p , network and same-site attackers can set a standard insecure cookie in the victim's browser which is treated as a __Host-?or __Secure-?cookie by PHP applications.?
